import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Mark ticket as sensitive"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/mark-sensitive"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Marks a ticket as containing sensitive information. Sensitive tickets have restricted visibility and may be hidden from certain users or reports to protect privacy. Use this for tickets involving HR issues, security incidents, or personal data.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Mark sensitive: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-sensitive](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-sensitive)
3. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm `HasSensitiveInformation: true`

**Visibility Impact**: Once marked, the ticket may be hidden from general searches, reports, and users without elevated permissions. Only designated staff can view sensitive tickets.

**Use Cases**: HIPAA-related issues, employee complaints, security breaches, confidential investigations, personal data requests.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-not-sensitive](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-not-sensitive) – Remove sensitive flag
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) – Check sensitive status

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}

  body={undefined}
